import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x Rs{item.price} = Rs{item.qty * item.price} ))} )} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
